DOC.brief_summary: To assess single- multiple-dose pharmacokinetic ( PK ) , safety tolerability AVP-786 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Tolerability AVP-786 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male 18 45 year age BMI 18 30 kg/m2 History presence significant disease History substance and/or alcohol abuse within past 3 year Use tobaccocontaining nicotinecontining product within 6 month Use prescription overthecounter ( OTC ) medication within 14 day
